Layer1_A_Version.text: How did your body feel when you first woke up?
Did you feel any physical tension or discomfort during the day?
Was your body more still or more restless today?
By the end of the day, your body felt...

Layer2_A_Version.text: How did you respond to small challenges today?
Did you avoid anything emotional today?
How did you interact with people today?
Did you feel in control of your reactions?

step.text: Do you feel like you couldn't make sense of how you felt today?
Which of these better describes your emotional state today?

Layer3_A_Version.question: What best describes the inner state you experienced today?
options: It felt like I was holding a lot inside
There was a sense of pressure or urgency
It was hard to relax or slow down

Layer3_A_Version.question: What kind of tension or friction stood out most today?
options: Plans or expectations were disrupted
Someone acted in a way that didn’t sit right
It felt hard to express what I needed

Layer3_A_Version.question: What kind of heaviness or depletion described your day best?
options: It felt like too much was happening at once
There was a quiet sense of emotional heaviness
I moved through the day without much energy

Layer3_A_Version.question: Was there a moment today that felt uplifting or quietly good?
options: Something made me smile or feel warm inside
I enjoyed doing something just for myself
There was a sense of lightness, even briefly

Layer3_A_Version.question: What best describes the atmosphere within you today?
options: There was a quiet stability in me
Things felt simple and clear
I noticed appreciation for ordinary moments

Layer3_A_Version.question: Was there a sense of distance or emotional absence today?
options: I moved through the day without really feeling connected
It felt like I was present, but not fully there
Even with others, I felt somewhat alone inside

Layer4.question: What made it hard to feel clear today?
options: Too many thoughts at once — I couldn’t sort through them
I didn’t feel anything, just a kind of blank space
My thoughts and emotions kept shifting too fast

Layer4.question: What triggered your tension or restlessness today?
options: An upcoming task or challenge
Too many things at once — I couldn’t catch my breath
Something small set me off more than usual

Layer4.question: Why do you think it affected you the way it did?
options: I felt like I had to control everything
I was already stretched thin
It touched a deeper worry I carry often

Layer4.question: What made things feel blocked or irritating today?
options: People or systems didn’t work the way I needed
I felt interrupted or not respected
Something small kept piling up

Layer4.question: What made this so hard to tolerate?
options: I had an expectation for how things should go
It felt unfair or out of my control
I was already carrying too much

Layer4.question: What weighed you down the most today?
options: Tasks or responsibilities felt endless
I felt emotionally flat or drained
Something quietly pulled me inward

Layer4.question: Why do you think this had such an impact on you?
options: I didn’t have enough time or space for myself
I’ve been holding too much for too long
There was something I couldn’t quite process

Layer4.question: What gave you a genuine sense of joy today?
options: Doing something I love or enjoy
Spending time with someone meaningful
A small moment that made me smile

Layer4.question: What helped you feel grounded or at ease today?
options: A moment of peace or pause
Trusting how things unfolded
Feeling thankful for something simple

Layer4.question: What made it hard to feel connected today?
options: I didn’t feel seen or understood
I kept things to myself, even when I needed support
I just moved through the day on autopilot

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from this confusion?
options: I didn’t know what I truly felt
I was overwhelmed and couldn't think clearly
I need more space to understand myself

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from your inner tension or anxiety?
options: I needed more safety or control
Something important was at risk
My body was reacting before I understood why

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from your frustration or anger?
options: I wanted something to go differently
I felt blocked or not respected
I cared deeply about something that didn’t work out

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from your emotional weight?
options: I needed rest or gentleness
Something meaningful felt missing
I was holding more than I realized

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from your sense of disconnection?
options: I needed more connection or meaning
I felt distant from myself or others
I lost touch with something important to me

Layer5.question: What did your calm or clarity tell you today?
options: I am aligned with what matters
I found peace in the moment
I could appreciate life as it was

Layer5.question: What insight can you take from your joy today?
options: Something lit me up from inside
I followed what brings me energy
Joy reminded me of what I love
